projects.title: Ecom Website for Baby Paradise (Shop)
projects.description: Developed an E-commerce website using Next.js and DRF with basic features as per client requirements. Deployed frontend on netlify and backend on PythonAnywhere.
projects.duration: (Mar 2024 - Present) //More features to discuss and add

projects.title: Flutter App for Baby Paradise
projects.description: Developed an E-com application using Flutter and Firebase. This app is used to manage the shop and its products. Authentication is done using Firebase Auth, Admin panel and user panel are connected to the same database.

projects.title: Resume Maker(Web) using Javascript&Json
projects.description: Developed a resume maker website using Javascript,Json, HTML, and CSS. This website allows users to create a single template resume in minutes, just by adding details about their education, experience, skills, and interests in the json file and printing it. Hoping to add more features and templates in the future. Also moving this website to Next js.
